controller.entities

Class EntityBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.entities.EntityBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CutFruitBody, FruitBody

    public class EntityBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class that represents an abstract physical body supported by a Box2D body.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body
      The Box2D body that supports this body.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a body representing a model in a certain world.

    • Method Detail

      • createFixture

        final void createFixture(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body,
                         float radius,
                         float density)
        Helper method to create a polygon fixture represented by a set of vertexes.
        Parameters:
        body - The body the fixture is to be attached to. easier to get them from a bitmap image.
        density - The density of the fixture. How heavy it is in relation to its area.
